summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing a potential candidate for a training program at JPMorgan Chase. Epstein recommends a 27-year-old individual, highlighting his personable nature and potential as an asset to the Florida office.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is mentioned as the recipient of an email from Jeffrey Epstein regarding a candidate for a training program.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, recommending a candidate for a training program at JPMorgan Chase.

connections.description: Epstein is reaching out to Staley regarding a potential candidate for employment at JPMorgan Chase.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein sent an email to Jes Staley recommending a 27-year-old candidate for a training program at JPMorgan Chase.
The candidate is described as personable and potentially a great asset to the Florida office.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
